entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 14. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
